argument.name: options
argument.description: A dot variable that returns printer options.

page.discussion: The UI_PRINTER_OPTIONS_GET() function retrieves a list of printer options. Limitations: Desktop applications only.
page.example: dim ptr as P dim ptr.dummy as L = .t. ui_printer_options_get("\\doc-build\Brother MFC9600 on Ne03:", ptr) ? ptr2 = collate = .F. color = Color Monochrome copies = 0 defaultsource = Automatically Select Auto Upper Paper Tray Lower Paper Tray Manual Paper Feed ...
